name: Melding Luminosity
description:
Twin stick shooter that can be played with either gamepad or mouse and keyboard.

There are a few secrets that can be found in this game!

Make sure you use the correct combination of ammo on the enemies!

Controls are shown in game, but just in case:

Mouse/Keyboard.:

Move: AWSD, or Arrow keys

Aim weapon: Move mouse around

Fire Weapon: Left mouse click

Change ammo type: mouse scroll/wheel

Gamepad/Xbox Controls:

Move: Move Left Joystick

Aim and Fire weapon: Move Right Joystick

Change ammo type: Left and Right Back Triggers/Shoulder buttons

Art/Sfx/Programming: Seth Funk

https://www.youtube.com/c/SethFunk

Music: Edie Evans 

Twitter: @edieevansmusic
